alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:58AM CST until February 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Louisiana... Neches River Near Town Bluff Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier Pine Island Bayou Near Sour Lake Sabine River Near Deweyville Neches River Near Evadale For the Sabine River...including Deweyville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Neches River...including Town Bluff, Evadale, Neches River Saltwater Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Pine Island Bayou...including Sour Lake...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 1000 AM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 3.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 4.2 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Neches River Neches River Saltwater Barri 4.0 3.0 Mon 9 am CST 4.1 4.2 3.7 &&
